This is why intimacy and communication between relationship is still important no matter how long you and your partner were together. Sure, cheating is wrong and will always be wrong, no matter what the reason behind is. But neglecting your partner without telling the reason why can result to this. Also, knowing what the love language of both parties can strengthen a relationship as well. Some people love it when they're shown physical intimacy, some are content with time, some wants material things because to them, it's a reminder of their partner's devotion, and some show their love through actions and service.

... Honestly? His backstabbing friend did him a HUGE favor. He could have ended up married other the fickle, worthless bitch. The fact that all she seems to need, to have a worthwhile relationship, is a stiff dick pretty much chose that she is not wife material for any decent man.  He may not see it right now, but he dodged a bullet, and can now focus on his true purpose, which was never to end up marrying a slut. Netorate never go beyond the story at end, but, if there's ever an epilogue about this story, set a decade later... how do you think it will actually play out? You think Azusa will actually be happy with her life with Tomoki? Except for dick size and stamina, does he has anything going for him? And is there any way that Naoyuki doesn't drastically level up, both professional and privately, now that he doesn't have those losers in his life to bring him down? C'mon now... Moral of this story: when God does you a huge favor, like HE did here for Naoyuki, take it and run with it.

Azusa has a younger sister that just graduated college hence why she hasn't been shown until now, and Nao with his newfound success and better salary at work, seduces her and marries her, making her happy, AND THEN SHOVING THAT FACT ON AZUSA. She could have been happy and live in comfort if she had stayed loyal, but instead her own sister has it all, and she has to settle with an average guy with an average job on an average salary, barely able to financially support their children (I'm assuming they have lots of kids since that's the only thing Tomoki is good at).
